letter.title: Quote Letter
letter.text: Thank you for sending us the information on SDL Trados Studio 2009. We like your products and think they certainly represent the most powerful translation solution on the market. It has helped us to set up support for our XML files in a flash. We have already downloaded the latest version from your Customer Center.
letter.title: Quote Details
letter.text: We would like to order 50 licenses. Please send us a quote. Keep up the good work!
